intent_atoms.description: Update Design System Guide to include FoundationUI integration checklist, migration path, quality gates, and accessibility requirements.

Design token usage verification points (5), component wrapper pattern points (4), testing requirements (5), platform compatibility points (5), accessibility compliance points (7), documentation points (4), build quality gates (5).
Migration path includes 10 component mappings, 7-step workflow, before/after code examples for Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, common pitfalls with solutions, rollback strategy.
Quality gates documented for phases 0-6 with objectives, validation metrics, success criteria, performance budgets (Phase 6).
Accessibility requirements meet WCAG 2.1 AA ≥98%, include VoiceOver testing, keyboard navigation, dynamic type support, color contrast, reduce motion, high contrast mode.
All code examples are accurate and testable; no broken links or references.
FoundationUI integration checklist added as Section 9 in Design System Guide with subsections 9.1-9.6.
Component mapping table for 10 components, migration workflow, and cross‑reference links to technical spec and test suite.
